title: [BUG] KNeighborsTimeSeriesClassifier fails on Japanese Vowels data
body:
**Describe the bug**
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
/mnt/nfsroot/zhangxj/Data_Cache/workflows/ipykernel_91785/972100154.py in <module>
      2 
      3 clf = KNeighborsTimeSeriesClassifier()
----> 4 clf.fit(df_X, df_y)

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/sktime/classification/distance_based/_time_series_neighbors.py in fit(self, X, y)
    196             Target values of shape = [n_samples]
    197         """
--> 198         X, y = check_X_y(
    199             X,
    200             y,

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/sktime/utils/validation/panel.py in check_X_y(X, y, enforce_univariate, enforce_min_instances, enforce_min_columns, coerce_to_numpy, coerce_to_pandas)
    186     check_consistent_length(X, y)
    187 
--> 188     X = check_X(
    189         X,
    190         enforce_univariate=enforce_univariate,

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/sktime/utils/validation/panel.py in check_X(X, enforce_univariate, enforce_min_instances, enforce_min_columns, coerce_to_numpy, coerce_to_pandas)
    107         # convert pd.DataFrame
    108         if coerce_to_numpy:
--> 109             X = from_nested_to_3d_numpy(X)
    110 
    111     return X

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/sktime/datatypes/_panel/_convert.py in from_nested_to_3d_numpy(X)
    912     # If all the columns are nested in structure
    913     if nested_col_mask.count(True) == len(nested_col_mask):
--> 914         X_3d = np.stack(
    915             X.applymap(_convert_series_cell_to_numpy)
    916             .apply(lambda row: np.stack(row), axis=1)

<__array_function__ internals> in stack(*args, **kwargs)

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numpy/core/shape_base.py in stack(arrays, axis, out)
    425     shapes = {arr.shape for arr in arrays}
    426     if len(shapes) != 1:
--> 427         raise ValueError('all input arrays must have the same shape')
    428 
    429     result_ndim = arrays[0].ndim + 1

ValueError: all input arrays must have the same shape

**To Reproduce**
```python
from sktime.datasets import load_japanese_vowels
from sktime.classification.distance_based import KNeighborsTimeSeriesClassifier
df_X, df_y = load_japanese_vowels(split='train', return_X_y=True)
clf = KNeighborsTimeSeriesClassifier()
clf.fit(df_X, df_y)
```

Q: I found 'Japanese Vowels' dataset different different length for per instance, but  from_nested_to_3d_numpy() function can not convert nested DataFrame to 3d numpy, so fails to KNeighborsTimeSeriesClassifier().  What should I do?
